item.title: Vengance
item.dc:creator: @Jairiya Jairiya
item.description:
@Jairiya wrote:

This is not finished just finish it your self it you want to.

add this to public ints:

public int vengance = 0;

add this to any spell:

vengance = 1; sendMessage("Vengance Has Been Activated!");

under

 else if(!UseBow){

add:

                            [CODE]  if(PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].vengance == 1) {
			        //actionAmount++;
				//setAnimation(playerSEA);
				PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
				PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
				PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
				hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(35);
                                    NewHP -= hitDiff;
                                    //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat();
                                    //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
                                    teleportToX = absX;
                                    teleportToY = absY;
                                    txt4 = "Taste Vengance!";
                                    string4UpdateRequired = true;
                                    PkingDelay = 15;  
                                    vengance = 0;}
                            [/CODE]

and under one of the parts below ^ add:

       else if(PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].vengance != 1) {
				        //actionAmount++;
					//setAnimation(playerSEA);
					PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].hitUpdateRequired = true;
					PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].updateRequired = true;
					PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn].appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
					hitDiff = 10 + misc.random(35);
                                        NewHP -= hitDiff;
                                        //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].inCombat();
                                        //server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].currentHealth -= server.npcHandler.npcs[npcIndex].hitDiff;
                                        teleportToX = absX;
                                        teleportToY = absY;
                                        txt4 = "Taste Vengance!";                                        string4UpdateRequired = true;
                                        PkingDelay = 15;  
                                        vengance = 0;}

and that is all i got up this is not a tutorial on how to add because it is not finished which i quit coding so
i decided why not let people try and finish it because i don’t care about it anymore.

if you do finish it don’t say it is all yours.

Read full topic
